snippet.title: LIVE: London court hears closing arguments in Johnny Depp's libel trial: departures
snippet.description:
Ruptly is live outside the High Court in London on Tuesday, July 28, as actor Johnny Depp and his ex-wife Amber Heard are present while the closing arguments in Depp’s libel trial against The Sun newspaper are made. 

Depp brought the lawsuit against the publication over a 2018 article claiming he was abusive to Heard. She has testified in defence of the publisher, speaking about the occasions in which she alleges Depp attacked or threatened to kill her.
